1.content:
A sudden chill runs down your body. You try to wrap your blanket around yourself only to find it isn't there. Reluctantly, you awaken to try and find it. You are rubbing the sleep from your eyes when you realize you're no longer in your bed. In fact you are no longer in your home!

         "Wha?" You squeak as you observe your new surroundings.

         You are in the court yard of a massive mansion. In front of you is fountain and beyond that is the mansion itself. The mansion itself is at least five stories high and a hundred kilometers in length. It has a typical front entrance and a massive door to the left of it that goes up all five stories. The sight of the mansion gives you an uneasy feeling.

         A cool breeze reminds you that you are only dressed in the pink silk night gown you fell asleep in. You feel taking shelter in the mansion would be a mistake though. So curling the toes of your barefeet you turn around to leave and quickly spy the front gate of a brick fence that surrounds the property. Making your way over you find that gate and fence tower about five feet above your head. Then when you attempt to leave you discover the gate is locked.

         "HEY! LET ME OUT!" You shriek as you began to panic. "PLEASE LET ME OUT!"

         You shake the gate and cry for help and to be let out to no avail. After about ten minutes of this you step back and attempt to calm down. That's when you notice the plaque next to the gate. Upon inspect you notice it reads:

         Welcome to Vore Mansion. If you wish to return home navigate the mansion while avoiding being eaten by the inhabitants. Just about everything in this mansion will attempt to eat you. Attempts to leave with out navigating the mansion will result in immediate consumption. Good luck on your journey.

         Upon reading this you feel your heart sink. If what this plaque said was true than you now prey. But what would you do now?
1.title: Waking up in a Strange Place

choices: Not any of them, you get the clue
13.content: Peering into the water, You see a clue. That was the good news. The bad news is that there are a load of creatures that want to turn you into pudge. You are a good swimmer and dive in, heading for the clue. Do you make it, or do you become pudge?
13.title: Inspect the Fountain

135.content:
You reach into the water and wrap your hand around the object and pull it out.

         "What the?" You mutter to yourself as you examine the object in your hand. It appears to be some kind of remote, but there is only one button on it. Curious you press the button. You let out a small yelp as you suddenly hear a rumbling sound. Then you watch as the fountain moves away to reveal a set of stone stairs leading underground.

         "Well when in rome," you gulp and proceed to make your way down the stairs. The stone is cold beneath your bare feet as make your descent. You are only about twenty steps down when you hear the fountain move back into place above you, and a series of torches suddenly spring to live to light your way. No going back now, you think to yourself and continue on your way. After about thirty minutes you come reach the bottom of the stairs and find yourself in a small circular chamber. The only way out is four tunnels numbered 1, 2, 3, and 4 respectively. Which one do you travel down?
135.title: Going Underground

14.content:
You are not quite sure what to make of your situation. All you now for sure is that the front does not look that inviting. In fact you may find a means of escape if you go around back.

         With that in mind you start walking towards the back of the mansion. Given the size of the mansion it takes you about a half hour to reach the back of the mansion. Once there you looked around, but see no immediate means of escape.

         All you see behind the mansion are three things. One a giant dog house that towers over you next to the back wall of the mansion. Second is a green house about half the length of the mansion. Lastly you notice a pond up against the fence about a meter to your right. What do you do?
14.title: Behind the Mansion

143.content:
You don't know why, but something about the pond seems to grab your attention. Quickly walking the meter to the pond you crouch down for a closer examination. Your eyes widen in surprise as you notice that it looks as though the pond goes under the fence. You could potentially swim out of here.

         You are about to wade into the pond when you remember what the plaque said. Attempting to escape result in you being eaten. Should you really risk it?
143.title: Potential Escape

1431.content: You decide to take the risk and dive in. But right before you can reach the exit you were grabbed by a...
1431.title: Risk it

14311.content: A pair of light blue flippers wrapped around and hoisted you to the surface. A Brionne smirked at you, licking her lips and pressing your head against her gut, letting you hear the mild gurgles. The Water Type opened her maw and stuffed your head in. She hummed at your taste, holding you down with her flippers. She swallowed and took in your chest. You let out a muffled scream as she ran her tongue over your tits, soaking in your taste. Brionne chuckled at your struggles. You were warned but tried to leave anyway, now you are Brionne blubber. She swallowed again and took in your gut, her sharp teeth poking your tender flesh as she ran her tongue over your gut. She swallowed again, taking in your ass, chewing gently and purring at your wriggles. Brionne swallowed again and slurped down your legs. As you started to struggle, Brionne belched and rubbed her gurgling belly and licking her lips. A few minutes later, she belched, your skull exiting her maw and landing on her belly. Brionne smirked and grabbed it before diving to the bottom, where hundreds of skulls were, with yours the newest one.
14311.title: Brionne

14312.content: A pair of blue flippers wrapped around you, and you were hoisted to the surface. A Popplio licked your cheek before licking her lips at your taste. "Yummy," she said happily before opening her maw and shoving your head in. The little seal hummed at your taste as you struggle to get free. She swallowed, taking in your chest, her throat bulging from your head. You groan as she ran her tongue over your breasts, her tail waving happily. The Water Type swallowed again and took in your gut, rubbing her bulging neck as she ran her tongue over your tender flesh. The Popplio giggled before swallowing again and took in your ass. You squirm uncomfortably as she ran her tongue over your cheeks. She giggled at your struggles before swallowing again and slurping down your legs, locking you in her belly. She belched and rubbed her gurgling belly happily, giggling at your struggles not to become blubber. A few minutes later, She belched, your skull flying from her maw. The Popplio slipped back underwater, ready for the next meal.
14312.title: Popplio

14313.content: A pair of orange paws grabbed you and towed you to the shore. A Buizel stood in front of you and licked her lips hungrily. Before you could do anything, she opened her maw and engulfed your head. You instantly start to wriggle, but Buizel held you still, running her tongue over your face. Buizel swallowed and took in your chest, her tail swishing at your taste as she ran her tongue over your tits. Buizel swallowed again, taking in your gut, rubbing her bulging neck. Her sharp teeth poked your tender flesh as she ran her tongue over your gut, soaking in as much of your taste before you were on her hips. She swallowed again, taking in your ass. You wriggle in discomfort as she ran her tongue over your ass-cheeks. She swallowed again and slurped down your legs, sealing you in her gut. You start to kick and thrash, but Buizel just belched before licking her lips and rubbed her gurgling belly. A few minutes, she belched, your skull flying from her maw. She smirked and gave her rear a slap before diving underwater.
14313.title: Buizel

info.brief_description: Can a young woman escape a labyrinthine mansion before she is eaten?
info.description:
You are a young woman named Luxia and you awaken in the middle of the night to find yourself on the grounds of a massive mansion. You soon find you need find a way out by solving puzzles and navigating various halls and rooms before you wind up in the belly of one the mansion's monstrous inhabitants. Escape or be digested.

Luxia(you): a beautiful young woman 19 years of age. Shoulder length white hair and blue eyes. Slim build. Only wearing a silk night gown. Height is 5' 5"

Rules:
1.) Soft and cock vore only
2.) Main character is not immune to digestion
3.) Be descriptive
4.) Have fun.
